sentences.en: Christ is inviting sinners to repentance.
sentences.cn: 基督正在敦请有罪的人悔悟.

sentences.en: He shows no repentance for what he has done.
sentences.cn: 他对他的所作所为一点也不懊悔.

sentences.en: I tried to devour my repentance and disgust in secret.
sentences.cn: 我竭力暗自吞咽我的后悔和憎恨.

sentences.en: I would inspire you with repentance and not drive you to desperation.
sentences.cn: 我是想叫你听了翻然悔改,而不是要把你赶到绝路上去.

sentences.en: It was too late now for repentance.
Life, it is thought, a dream, walking, Thanksgiving, or repentance.
sentences.cn: 生命, 是思考 、 梦想 、 行走 、 感恩或者忏悔.

sentences.en: Man's faith and repentance are gifts of the Holy Spirit.
sentences.cn: 人的信心与悔改是圣灵所赐的恩典.

sentences.en: My repentance brought a deep blush to my face.
sentences.cn: 我由于后悔而变得满脸通红.

sentences.en: Regeneration is not the subjective response of repentance and faith.
sentences.cn: 重生不是人主观的回应(悔改,信心).

sentences.en: Repentance alone did not cancel out such mortal sin.
sentences.cn: 单靠忏悔是不能勾销这种不可饶恕的大罪的.

sentences.en: Repentance skindeep . Pray at an altar . Hail Mary and Holy Mary.
sentences.cn: 她跪在祭坛前祷告,念着《万福玛利亚》和《至圣玛利亚》.

sentences.en: The follies of youth are food for repentance in old age.
sentences.cn: 〔谚语〕年轻时胡闹,年老时烦恼.

sentences.en: The police asked these troublemakers to make a statement of repentance.
sentences.cn: 警方责令这些聚众闹事者具结悔过.

sentences.en: They showed no repentance during their trial.
sentences.cn: 他们在受审期间没有表现出任何悔悟。

sentences.en: This was to the false disciple the last call to repentance.
sentences.cn: 对这假门徒,这就是劝他悔改的最后呼吁.

sentences.en: To regret one's errors to the point of not repeating them is true repentance.
sentences.cn: 对自己的错误后悔到不致重犯的程度是真正的后悔.

words.tran_cn: [植] 匍匐生根的；[动] 爬行的

trans.tran_en: when you are sorry for something you have done
